hm2TrafficMgmtMib.name: hm2TrafficMgmtMib
hm2TrafficMgmtMib.contactinfo: Postal: Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Phone: +49 7127 140 E-mail: hac.support@belden.com
hm2TrafficMgmtMib.description: Hirschmann Traffic Management MIB. Copyright (C) 2011. All Rights Reserved.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfTable.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfTable
hm2TrafficMgmtIfTable.description: A list of management objects for traffic control per interface.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfFlowControl.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfFlowControl
hm2TrafficMgmtIfFlowControl.description: Enables or disables flow control per port

hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRate.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRate
hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRate.description: Maximum bandwidth allowed for this interface as a whole, typically used to shape the outbound transmission rate. The value is either specified in terms of percentage of overall link speed for the port in 1% increments or absolute in kbps. A value of 0 means there is no maximum bandwidth limit in effect. The default value is 0. Valid value ranges depend on the value returned by object hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRateUnit. If that object returns percent(1), hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRate accepts values 0..100. If that object returns kbps(2), hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRate accepts values 0,64..4294967295.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRateUnit.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRateUnit
hm2TrafficMgmtIfEgressShapingRateUnit.description: The unit of the interface shaping value. Can be either percentage of port speed or kilobits per second (kbps).

hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlThreshold.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlThresholdUnit
hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlThreshold.description: Configures the units of the threshold value(s) to percentage of port speed or absolute packets per second.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlBcastMode.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlBcastMode
hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlBcastMode.description: If enabled, broadcast storm recovery will function on this port. When you specify Enable for Broadcast Storm Recovery and the broadcast traffic on this Ethernet port exceeds the configured threshold, the switch blocks (discards) the broadcast traffic.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlBcastThre.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlBcastThreshold
hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlBcastThre.description: Configures the broadcast storm recovery threshold for this port as a percentage of port speed in 1% increments or as an absolute pps rate. This threshold is also valid for multicasts or unknown unicasts, when the device does not support a separate limiter per storm type. (A separate limiter per storm-type is supported when hm2TrafficMgmtIngressStormBucketType has the value 'multi-bucket')

hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlMcastMode.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlMcastMode
hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlMcastMode.description: If enabled, multicast storm recovery will function on this port. When you specify Enable for multicast Storm Recovery and the multicast traffic on this Ethernet port exceeds the configured threshold, the switch blocks (discards) the multicast traffic.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlMcastThre.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlMcastThreshold
hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlMcastThre.description: Configures the multicast storm recovery threshold for this port as a percentage of port speed in 1% increments or as an absolute pps rate.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlUcastMode.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlUcastMode
hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlUcastMode.description: If enabled, unknown unicast storm recovery will function on this port. When you specify Enable for unicast Storm Recovery and the unknown unicast traffic on this Ethernet port exceeds the configured threshold, the switch blocks (discards) the unknown unicast traffic.

hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlUcastThre.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlUcastThreshold
hm2TrafficMgmtIfIngressStormCtlUcastThre.description: Configures the unicast storm recovery threshold for this port as a percentage of port speed in 1% increments or as an absolute pps rate.

hm2TrafficMgmtFlowControl.name: hm2TrafficMgmtFlowControl
hm2TrafficMgmtFlowControl.description: Enables or disables flow control for the switch unit.

hm2TrafficMgmtIngressStormBucketType.name: hm2TrafficMgmtIngressStormBucketType
hm2TrafficMgmtIngressStormBucketType.description: Enables or disables ingress storm admin state.
